Syphilis Is Killing Babies. The US is Failing to Stop the Disease From Spreading.

The only drug to treat syphilis during pregnancy is in short supply. Untreated, syphilis can pass to newborns, killing them or leaving them w/ disabilities. As cases rise, the US isn’t doing much to prevent shortages.

Tale as old as time. 

Buy up all the competitors, then 🤷🏻‍♂️ when things go bad a few years later.  😡

That’s what made Ellison’s lawsuit so unusual.’

"While the lawsuit targeted a single farm operation outside the Twin Cities, the reality is that substandard housing is widespread on dairy farms across the country. That’s because state and federal laws meant to ensure adequate housing for agricultural workers often exclude those on dairy farms."

"[S]ubstandard housing is widespread on dairy farms ... [L]aws meant to ensure adequate housing for agricultural workers often exclude those on dairy farms. As a result, employer-provided housing for dairy workers rarely, if ever, gets inspected, certified or even tracked by any government agency."
